archived.description: Is the release archived or not. Default: `false`

default-quantity.description: The default number of tickets selected for this release on the event page. Default: `0`

enable-super-combo-summary.description: For combo releases only. Include a summary of a combo in the order summary or not. Default: `true`

end-at.description: The time when the release will go off sale.

has-success-message.description: Display the custom success message or not. Default: `false`

max-tickets-per-person.description: The maximum number of tickets per registration.

min-tickets-per-person.description: The minimum number of tickets per registration.

not-a-ticket.description: Disable issuing of PDF/Apple Wallet tickets or not. For example if this release is for merchandise rather than an actual ticket. Default `false`

position.description: The position of the release in the list of all releases for the event.

question-ids.description: An array of the ids of `Questions` attached to the release. The order of the ids represents the order in which the questions will be asked.

request-company-name.description: Do registrations which include this release requrie a company name.

request-vat-number.description: Do registrations which include this release require a VAT number.

require-billing-address.description: Do registrations which include this release require a billing address.

require-email.description: Do tickets for this release require an email. Default: `true`

require-name.description: Do tickets for this release require a name. Default: `false`

secret.description: Is it only accessible via a secret link or is it visible to everyone on the event page. Default: `false`

start-at.description: The time when the release will go on sale.

success-message.description: A custom message to be displayed to customers after a successful order of this release.

waiting-list-enabled-during-sold-out.description: Enable waiting list when this release sells out or not. Default: `false`
